column2: As a Sr Manager Manager WSN, Impact will be responsible for Impact tracking reporting for the WSN program at Wadhwani Foundation. You will also be responsible for driving the learnings into our products and program, thereby improving the program, and scaling the impact of our work.         Setting Vision Strategy            Create robust, scalable frameworks for tracking and monitoring key process indicators and impact of WSN program.             Develop and improve upon WSN programs data and learning strategy, including data dashboards, in consultation with key stakeholders in the organization. This would include identifying strategic learning questions and evidence needed to answer them, as well as defining systems, processes and routines, required to understand progress and drive continuous improvement.             Ensure that data collected by Impact meets the reporting requirements of key stakeholders, including Senior Leadership and supports organization-wide data strategy and monitoring, evaluation and learning efforts           Lead the Execution of the Strategy            Partner with Global Director, Impact and colleagues in the Impact team to ensure efficient and effective collection and management of data in organizational data storage systems in accordance with the articulated data strategy.             Ensure that members of the WSN program are able to easily access and use data to understand progress and drive continuous improvement. This includes, but is not limited to building and refining dashboards, providing analysis around key function-level strategic questions, and fostering a data-driven learning culture within the function             Partner with members of the WSN team to develop short- and longer-term impact measurement plans, including identifying how best to assess the impact of a given type of learning experience             Manage the function-level process and key stakeholders to engage in reflection and learning activities, and, at times, contribute to the execution of team-level reflection and learning processes Collaborate with members of WSN team to develop and disseminate data-driven insights and stories which illustrate progress and impact             Ensure that the WSN programs data and learning is captured and contributing to organizational and network level conversations and can be leveraged for reporting on progress and impact             Coach members of Global Impact around execution of the data strategy                         Requirements          About You:                 First and foremost, you bring passion and dedication to this work, because it matters to you.                     5-7 years of experience in consulting, startup, social enterprise, impact investing or corporate environment                     Demonstrated ability to build systems, processes and rituals that serve the need of diverse set of stakeholders, and promote a data-driven culture                     A natural affinity towards data, and a high proficiency with analysis                     An orientation towards and passion for Quality at Scale , you are always asking yourself how will it improve our beneficiaries lives                     Excellent presentation and data analysis skills. High Levels of comfort with technology and software                     Superb communication skills, both verbal and written                     Strong experience and comfort with people management and mentorship                     Great core skills of empathy, problem solving, team work and project management                     Knowledge and passion to support Program teams achieve their goals                     Comfort in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment; awesome ability to prioritize and manage multiple work-streams                 Additional desirable skills                 Experience in skilling or livelihoods space and having worked with organizations in the ecosystem                     Experience working across geographies and cultural contexts                 You will succeed in this role and be a good cultural fit if:                 You have a bias towards action you get your hands dirty and you re actively tackling problems that lead to great outcomes                     You can balance rigor and flexibility                     Embrace taking strategic risks and growing from mistakes                     You can work independently and influence larger organization-wide decision making without formal authority                     Most importantly, you identify with the urgency of Wadhwani Foundation s mission and are eager to make it happen

column2: The Delivery Manager will be responsible to manage the total development one or more of Management Systems clients (including internal clients), called a work stream     To deliver high quality technical solutions to the clients through the effective leadership of systems development staff either directly or indirectly     All solutions to be within the commercial objectives of Experian and client     The ideal candidate will have excellent written, oral and interpersonal communication skills, along with the fervent desire to continuously learn about different products and technologies             What you ll be doing         Project Management         Identification and implementation of methods, processes, tools, etc. to reduce development time.      Ensuring that processes/methodologies are followed which lead to zero fault status of products/services at time of delivery to the client.     Maintain a constant flow of project work, to maintain the utilisation of staff within Management Systems     Provision of high level project plans for all development within the stream     Delivery of projects into production with no unanticipated impact on postproduction support.     Responsible for all client initiated projects from inception to implementation     Regular reviews with Project Managers and/or client/project team leaders regarding status of client projects that highlight actions needed to ensure delivery on time and within budget.     Recommend changes in existing practises / processes / methodologies      Provision of high level plans showing key milestones of all stream projects. Effective succession planning for business continuity.     Development of staff         Customer Service / Support         Development of effective working relationships with key clients to facilitate communication and reduce misunderstandings. These to be based on standard working practises/processes with the Division.     Resolution of escalated problems or queries to the client s satisfaction and implementation of actions to prevent recurrence.     Conduct regular reviews with the client to improve qulaity and processes.         Sales Process / Product Knowledge         A thorough understanding of divisional products and services and their use by clients.      A working knowledge of the main products and services of other divisions in the Group, particularly where they interface o r relate to own division s products/services.      Adheres to Product Management guidelines when developing business functionality on behalf of the     Adheres to design and architectural guidelines provided by ADTC         Finance/Commercial         Maintains the cost centre attributed to the work stream     Provision of initial budgets and subsequent forecasts     Contribution to the creation of the annual cost budgets (labour, training, etc.), monitoring of expenditure against agreed budgets, taking action where overspending is identified and presenting of business cases for additions/amendments to the budgets as required.     Provision of development revenue forecasts in conjunction with the Account Director     Determine Processing Revenue opportunities (i.e. secure long term revenues) in conjunction with the Account Director         Experience in IT/systems development including some years in project and people management     Appraisal skills     Staff Management     Project management     Client management skills     Can work at board lev

column2: As a Manager, youll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this management level include but are not limited to:           Develop new skills outside of comfort zone.     Act to resolve issues which prevent the team working effectively.     Coach others, recognise their strengths, and encourage them to take ownership of their personal development.     Analyse complex ideas or proposals and build a range of meaningful recommendations.     Use multiple sources of information including broader stakeholder views to develop solutions and recommendations.     Address sub-standard work or work that does not meet firms/clients expectations.     Use data and insights to inform conclusions and support decision-making.     Develop a point of view on key global trends, and how they impact clients.     Manage a variety of viewpoints to build consensus and create positive outcomes for all parties.     Simplify complex messages, highlighting and summarising key points.     Uphold the firms code of ethics and business conduct.                                 Job Description   :     We are seeking a results-driven Workforce Management professional with a proven track record to lead our Sector/Sub-Business Unit Resource Management team.         We are looking for go-getters who can work with the business to predict future demand projections, staffing needs, plan capacity and assign staff to our projects. The candidate will be responsible to assess the ongoing demand and capacity, determine personnel requirements based on staffing rules and regulatory compliance guidelines and collaborating on resource management with multiple teams within our organization.         As a Resource Manager, you will be responsible and accountable to meet all resource management KPIs for the assigned Business Unit, Sub-Business Unit, Industry/Sector or territory. You will provide subject matter support to stakeholders, build creative staffing solutions, maneuver over/under staffing situations and provide proactive inputs to the business. You will also be responsible for supervising your team, upskill/cross skill team members, provide coaching and guidance, timely and quality focused delivery.         To ensure success as a Resource Manager, you should possess extensive domain knowledge in resource management, demand - supply planning, project-based staffing, capacity and headcount planning, demand and supply forecasting, capacity and bench management, scheduling and business analytics. A best fit will be someone who can accurately predict staffing needs and generate capacity to fulfil project demands.         Prior resource management experience in Big 4s, Audit/Tax/accounting practice and/or financial services industry will be preferred.           Key Responsibilities   :         Analyzing annual budget plans and generating capacity to enable effective staffing on projects based on scope of work, skills, prior experience, availability, regulatory requirements and project budget.         Proactive capacity and headcount planning to minimize over/under staffing scenarios.         Act as a control owner to ensure 100% compliance on all regulatory requirements and business rules associated with resource allocations and staffing on projects.         Demonstrate success against all business, operational and people management KPIs.         Drive continuous improvement, process transformation, technology enablement and automation to create measurable efficiencies within the team.         Monitor schedule adherence, address schedule changes and resolve staffing conflicts.         Minimize staffing gaps, reduce non billable time and optimize staffing during busy periods.         Analyze and execute staffing solutions to meet unplanned demands.         Collaborate with Talent acquisition on new hire allocations in accordance with project budgets and Capacity plans.         Create dashboards to monitor, analyze and report against key KPIs.         Documenting processes and maintaining records.         Stakeholder management - Create strong connects with stakeholders in the business, onshore, cross ACs, Talent, Finance and cross LOS.         Team management - Backup and succession planning, quality monitoring, performance evaluation, career guidance and overall supervision.               Key Skills and Experiences:           Any Graduate/Post-Graduate. Specialization in Human Resources/Statistics will be preferred.         10 - 12 years of relevant, post qualification work experience in reputed organizations with a proven track record of career growth and stability.         Proficiency in resource management/workforce management domain.         Must have at least 5 years of experience in directly supervising teams.         Must have at least 5-6 years of experience in managing stakeholders.         Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.         Excellent negotiation skills.         Excellent process documentation and presentation skills - knowledge in using MS Visio, PowerPoint and Google Slides to create impactful process flows and presentations.         Exceptional organizational and time-management skills with a proven record of working under tight deadlines.         Very strong team management skills.         Prior experience in project management/change management/process transformation will be preferred.         Working knowledge of Power BI, Spotfire, Tableau and Google Charts will be preferred.
column11: Change management, Automation, Team management, Staffing, Project management, Business analytics, Scheduling, Forecasting, Financial services, Auditing

column2: Skills:      Mandatory Skills:          Detailed understanding of and experience with Agile project planning and management methodologies (e. g. ,  Scrum,  Scaled Agile) workflow process documentation,  and operational improvement.       Strong written and verbal communication and customer/stakeholder management skills.       Advanced skills with technology-focused Project Management tools.           Desired Skills          You must demonstrate high organizational,  cross functional skills (i. e. ,  should have experience to understand Technology,  User Interface,  Creative,  Analytics etc. ) efficient time management,  effective communication,  and team-oriented focus and will be able to work with minimal direction in a fast-paced,  continuously evolving environment.            What you ll be responsible for:      Day to day,  the Project Manager manages the tasks (create Sub Task,  Add Technical Note   i. e. ,  Step by Step method to execute the Tasks),  dependencies,  and risks associated with one or more projects to ensure successful completion and adherence to quality standards,  budgetary guidelines,  and timelines.  Your typical days would include the following activities:          Manage projects,  including identifying requirements,  stakeholder involvement,  risks,  dependencies,  deliverables,  review and approval processes,  and anticipated milestone dates and adjusting throughout the course of the project with proper communication throughout.       Collaborate with cross functional teams to conduct work breakdowns,  identify necessary resources,  and collect time and complexity estimates.       Clarify and refine project objectives,  acceptance criteria,  budget,  and work plan with technical teams and leaders.       Communicate blockers,  risks,  recommendations,  and escalations to leadership and stakeholders,  proactively and consistently,  to ensure needs are met and expectations are aligned.       Align with product management teams in order to accurately represent business objectives and communicate project status in terms of business objectives.       Train,  coach and mentor the project teams in methodologies throughout the project lifecycle.            Challenges (also responsible) you ll be facing in the role:          Outstanding organization,  time management,  and prioritization skills.       Practiced skill at managing multiple initiatives and work streams in parallel.       Independent drive to become a subject matter expert in the technology that this position supports,  such that the project manager can identify gaps,  exposures,  and contradictions in the plan and proactively rectify them.       Natural comfort with taking the lead and respectfully guiding team members to expectations that achieve success.       A knack for finding common ground and positive outcomes in difficult situations.       Great listening ears to understand what is and isn t being said.       Strong initiative to understand new situations or complex tools,  to ask thoughtful questions,  and seek better ways of working and communicating.       Genuine passion for learning new tools,  processes,  and formats.       Positive and team-focused attitude,  always. column2: The Program Manager plays a crucial role in ensuring the smooth and efficient execution of projects and initiatives aligned with the vision of the company. This role will work closely with the executive team, and various stakeholders to drive project success through effective project management practices, coordination, and planning.             Key Responsibilities:           Planning:    Collaborate with the executive team to define project goals, objectives, and key deliverables aligned with the companys vision and strategic priorities.       Project Management:    Lead and manage projects from initiation to closure, ensuring adherence to project scope, timelines, and budget constraints.       Stakeholder Engagement:    Facilitate communication and collaboration among cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and external partners to ensure alignment and buy-in throughout the project lifecycle.       Risk Management:    Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks and issues proactively to minimize disruptions and ensure project success.       Resource Allocation:    Work closely with department heads and team leads to allocate resources effectively, including personnel, budget, and other necessary assets.       Performance Monitoring:    Develop and implement project performance metrics and KPIs to track progress, identify areas for improvement, and ensure timely delivery of project outcomes.       Process Improvement:    Continuously evaluate and enhance project management processes, tools, and methodologies to optimize efficiency and effectiveness.       Reporting and Documentation:    Prepare regular status reports, presentations, and documentation for internal and external stakeholders, providing insights into project progress, achievements, and challenges.       Change Management:    Support organizational change initiatives by effectively managing change impacts, communication, and stakeholder engagement.       Advisory Role:    Provide guidance, support, and mentorship to project teams, helping them overcome obstacles, leverage best practices, and achieve project objectives.         Qualifications:               Proven experience 2 years in project management, preferably within a strategic planning role.     Experience in a startup environment or working closely with company founders is a mandate.     Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate effectively at all levels of the organization.     Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen attention to detail and a focus on delivering results.     Maturity to maintain confidentiality.
column11: Stakeholder Engagement, Change management, Project management, Analytical, Process improvement, Resource allocation, Strategic planning, Budgeting, Risk management, Performance monitoring

column2: Job Description for Delivery Head/VP:   Role & responsibilities- Digital Transformation Strategy: - Develop and execute a comprehensive digital transformation strategy that aligns with the overall goals and objectives. Identify opportunities to leverage technology and digital solutions to improve efficiency, productivity, and customer experience. IT Infrastructure Management: -     Oversee the design, implementation, and maintenance of the IT infrastructure, including networks, servers, storage, and data centres. Ensure the IT infrastructure is scalable, secure, and capable of supporting the organization's current and future needs. Manages annual OPEX and CAPEX budget for infrastructure, develops and ensure it is consistent with overall strategic objectives. Application Development and Management: -     Manage the development, implementation, and maintenance of business applications and software solutions to streamline processes and support various functions. Ensure that applications are user-friendly, reliable, and meet the needs of different departments. Digital Project Management: -     Lead and manage digital projects, ensuring they are delivered on time, within budget, and meet specified requirements. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project execution. User Training and Support:     Provide training and support to employees to enhance their digital literacy and effectively use digital tools and systems. Establish a helpdesk or support system to address IT-related issues promptly. Performance Monitoring and Reporting:     Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of IT and digitization initiatives. Regularly report on KPIs and provide insights to senior management for strategic decision-making

column2: ?   Icertis is the only contract intelligence platform companies trust to keep them out in front, now and in the future. Our unwavering commitment to contract intelligence is grounded in our FORTE values Fairness, Openness, Respect, Teamwork and Execution which guide all our interactions with employees, customers, partners and stakeholders. Because in our mission to be the contract intelligence platform of the world, we believe how we get there is as important as the destination                   Responsibilities:        Cultivate successful and trusted relationships with business development and selected service partners.     Effectively manage our partners in their journey with Icertis, as they get onboarded and enabled for Icertis product implementations for enterprise customers      Take ownership to ensure smooth partner onboarding via required trainings, certifications and ongoing capability building to ensure they have the right levels of knowledge and levers within Icertis, as they work on customer projects.      Conceptualize and formulate best practices, content, and templates that can be centralized across implementations for the benefit of the entire partner community     Be a key player in the implementation ongoing maintenance of the partner portal that will provide a seamless digital experience encompassing all stages of the Icertis partner life cycle     Influence setting up Partner CoEs for reaping ongoing implementation efficiencies and thought leadership in overall capability building and knowledge management     Maintain effective relationships internally with all functions and drive change management considering the interests and impact of all stakeholders.     Be a SPOC for partners to reach out to in Icertis for any enablement needs specifically around training and knowledge management.      Closely work with Delivery teams in the Partner Enablement Success (PES) group to understand ongoing enablement opportunities to incorporate the same for ongoing support      Champion company policies and processes and ensure adherence within the Partner Enablement team.     Collaborate and coordinate across multiple Icertis teams globally as Partner Enablement as a function will have several touchpoints for seamless operations     Facilitate interaction, manage inter-dependencies, and conflict resolution among all functional teams globally.     Communicate the key elements of the program and guide partners through the Partner Enablement phases of the Services Partner life cycle.           This job is LinkedIn supported. #LI-MS.               Skills and Qualifications:        13+ years of experience managing strategic projects E2E, especially around team capability building and enablement      Possess a deep understanding of the various phases of project management including initiating, planning, execution, monitoring, control, and closure. Demonstrate good knowledge of SDLC, project management, implementation methodologies and their application.     Must have direct client/partner engagement experience over multiple end-to-end implementations.     Acumen to correctly interpret trends, and patterns from available data and formulate effective strategies and actions in achieving program/project objectives.     Strategic thinker who can blend consulting and business strategy to innovate and develop compelling plans for new partner initiatives.     Solid interpersonal and negotiation skills; should be able to facilitate engagements and handle objections in real-time.     Excellent communication skills (written and verbal); should be able to prepare and deliver presentations to C-level executives.     Superior organizational skills with the ability to effectively prioritize on day-to-day and week-to-week basis.     Experience in a dynamic, hyper-growth environment.     Content writing experience is preferred.     Must have an Engineering degree from a reputed institute.      A high degree of ethics and integrity.

column2: SBI CARDS AND PAYMENT SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED. is looking for Assistant Vice President - Compute & Storage project to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Assistant Vice President to lead our Compute & Storage project team      In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing the planning, implementation, and optimization of our compute and storage infrastructure to support the organization's strategic objectives      The successful candidate will possess strong leadership skills, technical expertise, and a proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and within budget        Responsibilities:        Strategic Planning: Develop and execute a strategic roadmap for the compute and storage infrastructure, aligning with business goals and objectives      Project Management: Lead cross-functional project teams in the planning, execution, and delivery of compute and storage initiatives, ensuring adherence to project timelines and budget constraints      Technology Evaluation: Assess emerging technologies and trends in compute and storage solutions, making recommendations for adoption or integration into existing systems      Infrastructure Design: Collaborate with architects and engineers to design scalable and resilient compute and storage architectures that meet the organization's performance and reliability requirements      Vendor Management: Evaluate and negotiate contracts with technology vendors and service providers, ensuring cost-effective solutions that meet project specifications      Risk Management: Identify potential risks and issues related to compute and storage projects, developing mitigation strategies to minimize impact on project delivery and business operations      Stakeholder Engagement: Communicate project updates, milestones, and outcomes to key stakeholders, including senior management, IT leadership, and business partners      Performance Monitoring: Implement monitoring and reporting mechanisms to track the performance and utilization of compute and storage resources, optimizing efficiency and resource allocation      Team Leadership: Provide leadership and mentorship to project team members, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement

column2: As a Sr Manager/ Manager WSN, Impact will be responsible for Impact tracking & reporting for the WSN program at Wadhwani Foundation. You will also be responsible for driving the learnings into our products and program, thereby improving the program, and scaling the impact of our work.            Setting Vision & Strategy                Create robust, scalable frameworks for tracking and monitoring key process indicators and impact of WSN program.        Develop and improve upon WSN programs data and learning strategy, including data dashboards, in consultation with key stakeholders in the organization. This would include identifying strategic learning questions and evidence needed to answer them, as well as defining systems, processes and routines, required to understand progress and drive continuous improvement.                Ensure that data collected by Impact meets the reporting requirements of key stakeholders, including Senior Leadership and supports organization-wide data strategy and monitoring, evaluation and learning efforts                            Lead the Execution of the Strategy                Partner with Global Director, Impact and colleagues in the Impact team to ensure efficient and effective collection and management of data in organizational data storage systems in accordance with the articulated data strategy.        Ensure that members of the WSN program are able to easily access and use data to understand progress and drive continuous improvement. This includes, but is not limited to building and refining dashboards, providing analysis around key function-level strategic questions, and fostering a data-driven learning culture within the function        Partner with members of the WSN team to develop short- and longer-term impact measurement plans, including identifying how best to assess the impact of a given type of learning experience        Manage the function-level process and key stakeholders to engage in reflection and learning activities, and, at times, contribute to the execution of team-level reflection and learning processes Collaborate with members of WSN team to develop and disseminate data-driven insights and stories which illustrate progress and impact        Ensure that the WSN programs data and learning is captured and contributing to organizational and network level conversations and can be leveraged for reporting on progress and impact                Coach members of Global Impact around execution of the data strategy                About You:                    First and foremost, you bring passion and dedication to this work, because it matters to you.                5-7 years of experience in consulting, startup, social enterprise, impact investing or corporate environment              Demonstrated ability to build systems, processes and rituals that serve the need of diverse set of stakeholders, and promote a data-driven culture              A natural affinity towards data, and a high proficiency with analysis              An orientation towards and passion for Quality at Scale, you are always asking yourself how will it improve our beneficiaries lives              Excellent presentation and data analysis skills. High Levels of comfort with technology and software              Superb communication skills, both verbal and written              Strong experience and comfort with people management and mentorship              Great core skills of empathy, problem solving, team work and project management              Knowledge and passion to support Program teams achieve their goals                            Comfort in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment; awesome ability to prioritize and manage multiple work-streams                                              Additional desirable skills                    Experience in skilling or livelihoods space and having worked with organizations in the ecosystem                            Experience working across geographies and cultural contexts              You will succeed in this role and be a good cultural fit if:                    You have a bias towards action you get your hands dirty and youre actively tackling problems that lead to great outcomes              You can balance rigor and flexibility              Embrace taking strategic risks and growing from mistakes              You can work independently and influence larger organization-wide decision making without formal authority              Most importantly, you identify with the urgency of Wadhwani Foundationmission and are eager to make it happen

column2: Synopsys is looking for a customer centric and business savvy Program Manager to join the Systems Solutions Group (SSG) at Synopsys.                          The candidate will manage one or more strategic System Solution initiatives to serve the increasing needs of our customers.         The SSG Program Management Office (PMO) at Synopsys acts as the interface between Customers, Synopsys Product Groups and SSG experts towards creating unified solutions that address the growing needs of our customers     We work cross-functionally with internal development teams (Technical Pre Sales, Marketing, FAE, CAE, and R&D) and have exposure and visibility on a global scale throughout the organization     In this role, the program manager works within our internal development teams to ensure we deliver to our customers and partner's requirement to meet their roadmap/SoC goals and identify opportunities to include our IPs and EDA solutions in their futures roadmap/SoCs       Program Managers work closely with our customers to manage Design Services and Consulting projects for their key programs and successfully execute the programs against established commitments; act as the focal point of contact and manage all external and internal communications to cross-functional teams spanning geographical and organizational boundaries; plans and directs schedules; identifies and escalates issues; drives problems to resolution; identifies and manages risk     Programs may include new solutions development        A valued candidate would be someone with a strategic mind-set and a passion for transformation     The candidate is expected to have experience in managing external customers, understanding of the EDA and IP ecosystem, program management methodology/process practice, sound technical understanding of SOC design flows/methodologies, IC manufacturing process and process technologies     Must have a strong background and proven track record in driving initiatives and results by effectively managing resources and complex programs     Must be an agile learner, able to establish and view things from a global perspective to effectively drive results           Responsibilities -                         Own responsibility and team accountability for one or more Design Services or Consulting engagements and set strategic direction of customer experience aligning with company objectives and customer needs.                                 Manage Schedule to Committed Milestones. Identify Risks & Change Requests - and create methods to address them.                                  Serve as a Customer Success Manager, designing and driving end-to-end customer experience from execution start through silicon success.                                  Collaborate with cross functional groups to ensure Customer Satisfaction in program management and support throughout the customer journey.                                 Proactively prevent and manage customer escalations for the region.                                 Embody a collaborative, supportive and inspirational leadership style to deliver results that exceed expectations.                                 Key Qualifications -                                 B.S./M.S. in Electrical Engineering or a related technical discipline, or equivalent experience                                 8+ years of industry experience, including systems engineering, hardware engineering, or technical product/program management experience.                                 Possess excellent working knowledge of Microsoft Project, PowerPoint, Excel, and Word                                 Experience organizing and communicating information, representing work to senior leadership and framing discussions to gain valuable feedback.                                 Analytical and problem-solving experience with customer issues, engineering problems and large-scale systems.                                 Strong verbal/written communication, leadership, face-to-face, and team partnership work skills are required to succeed in this role.                                 Collaborative team player, supportive and comfortable in a matrixed, international, team-oriented environment with multiple stakeholders                                 Preferred experience                                 MBA and/or PMP training is preferred.                                 Having ASIC design center and/or SoC design management with customer interfacing experience is a plus.                                 Knowledge/Experience in one or more areas preferred: Hyper-Scaler, Low Power, Multi-Die Solutions, Automotive

column1: Head of Sales and Marketing (IT Services)
column2: Job Overview:   We are actively looking for a seasoned and innovative Head of Sales and Marketing to spearhead our sales and marketing strategies for our diverse portfolio of our IT services. These services encompass a wide range, including Custom Application Development/Support, ERP Services, and Cloud/ Cyber Security Solutions, along with top-tier products tailored for various industry verticals such as Logistics (WMS), Maritime (Port Agency), Travel, Goods & Services Trading, and BFSI. The ideal candidate will bring a wealth of experience and a proven track record in IT services sales, B2B sales, product sales, pre-sales, and marketing leadership. We are seeking someone with a strong focus on delivering results and a strategic mindset to drive success across key regions including India, the Middle East, Asia Pacific, Europe, and the United States. If you are a dynamic professional ready to take on this exciting challenge and make a significant impact in the IT services industry, we want to hear from you. Key Responsibilities: Strategic Leadership: Spearheading the sales and marketing efforts for the company's IT services and products across various industry verticals. Developing and implementing strategic plans to drive business growth, achieve business goals and objective and enhance market share. Identify market opportunities and define sales and marketing plans to maximize market penetration and profitability. Marketing Strategy and Planning: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility, recognition, and support sales efforts.  Ensuring consistent brand messaging across all marketing channels Managing marketing budgets, allocating resources, and setting marketing goals. Oversee the creation of marketing materials, campaigns, and events. Analyse market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to refine marketing strategies. Team Management: Leading and managing sales and marketing teams, including recruitment, training, and performance management. Fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within the teams. Customer Engagement: Building and maintaining relationships with key customers, understanding their needs, and identifying opportunities to upsell or cross-sell. Ensuring high level of customer satisfaction and loyalty through effective account management, service delivery, regular communication.  Handle high-level client negotiations and resolve any issues or concerns. Market Analysis and Intelligence: Conducting market research and analysis to stay ahead of competitors and identify new opportunities. Providing market insights and recommendations to inform business decisions. Performance Monitoring and Reporting: Tracking and analysing sales and marketing performance metrics, including revenue, customer acquisition costs, and return on investment. Providing regular reports and insights to senior management and other stakeholders. Collaboration and Partnerships: Building and maintaining partnerships with other business units, vendors, and industry partners to drive growth and innovation. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop and launch new products and services. Building partnerships with complementing products, resellers, and other channels.  Product Sales: Collaborate with product development teams to ensure offerings meet market needs. Provide feedback on product enhancements and new product development based on market demand. Drive product innovation and leveraging technologies to be competitive with progressive mindset.  Pre-sales  Leading and managing pre-sales team for lead generation, RFP, proposal, bidding.  High involvement in contract negotiations, solution reviews, Estimations, pricing, partner-based solutions, and client meetings etc.  Financial Management: Prepare and manage sales and marketing budgets. Monitor and report on sales and marketing metrics and financial performance. Overall, the Head of Sales and Marketing plays a critical role in driving business growth, enhancing market share, and increasing revenue for the company. They must possess strong leadership, strategic thinking, and communication skills, as well as a deep understanding of the IT industry and market trends.  Qualifications and Experience: Education:  Bachelors degree in engineering, business administration, Marketing, IT, or a related field. MBA or advanced degree is preferred. Experience:  15-20+ years of experience in sales and marketing, specifically in B2B, product sales, IT services, and cloud services. Key Skills: Strong Sales capabilities and leadership skills. Proven ability to develop and execute sales strategic plans. Strategize sales planning for multiple products across industry vertical.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. New Product Launches, Go to market plans. Customer life cycle management and acquisition. Ability to generate revenue through Upselling, Cross Selling  Experience in using CRM application/other sales and marketing tools. Digital Marketing: growth marketing and performance.   Brand management & Marketing communication  Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Alliances & Partnerships  Personal Attributes: Visionary and forward thinking. Highly motivated and results oriented. Ability to thrive in a fast paced and dynamic environment. Strong negotiation and persuasion skills. Customer centric mindset. Professional etiquettes Quick adaptability and learnability  Compensation: Competitive salary and performance-based incentives. Comprehensive benefits package.
column11: Sales And Marketing, Cross Selling, Analytical Skills, New Product Launch, Strategic Brand Management, Leadership Skills, Brand Marketing, Communication Skills, Upselling, Go-to-market Strategy, Customer Life Cycle Management, Revenue Expansion, Interpersonal Skills
